channel.title: Lagrima Rios on Simba Tango

item.title: Lágrima Ríos & Candombe
item.author: simbatango@gmail.com (Simba)
item.description: I just love the name! Lágrima Ríos is a wonderful artistic name, Rivers of tears.. Re tango, no? My attention was brought to some of her recordings by Michael’s music blog, discussing some available recordings of hers. Luckily, I was able to find them both at emusic for instant satisfaction :-) She is featured in the film Café de los maestros, which I have not yet been able to get hold of (but will eventually!
